title: Riot should make champions free
body: I am playing league of legends and I thought its quite tough to buy all champions.It will take app. one year to buy all champions and one year to master them.Its fine with the skins on sale but buying champions is really hard for newbies specially new champions.Most of the players lost interest because they play lol for an year and what they get!!!!!!! All champions. I believe if Riot make all champions free then newbies could also enjoy playing lol

replies.body:
I'm still missing a ton of champions, but I don't really want many of them.  There are probably about 3 that I'm still interested in getting.
People don't need every champion in the game.  People need the champions in their main and sub roles.

Edit:  It also helps keep it from overwhelming new players with information.  Rather than having 131x4 (too tired to math) abilities +131 passives to learn, they have 12 and 3 respectively.  They could do this by just unlocking a certain number of champion as you level up, but I feel like leveling up goes by too fast for this.

I've been playing about a year as a support main and just recently ujnlocked the last "sepport champ." I enjoyed the grind to unlock them. I did buy some with RP but for the most part it was IP. It gets old, people asking for more free stuff in a F2P game

I think that these is done in order to keep players interested in the game. Think of it as a challenge. I do, how ever see that "one year" way off. I've been also playing for 3 weeks and i already got like 5 champions. Although as stated before people don't really need all of the champions unlocked if you are not a collector of some sort.

Which is why i assume they have free champions every week in order to test them out and if you dig it, get it. And still get some rune pages and runes for them.
I've played ~4k games and i'm missing ~8 champions. They want you to buy them with RP.
No champions : no money : no development and rent : no riot games : no Lego legions
Too late at this point. Doing that will invalidate the work of people who've been playing the game for a long time, as well as the potential RP purchases of champions.

Idk how people get the IP to buy all the champions in "approximately 1 year"... Been playing regularly (to say the least) for about 4 years and I still have 25 champions 4800-6300 IP to buy. Well over 2000 games played. Not a crazy amount of runes/pages bought either.
